arts.ttl: Outstanding Lamine: Yamal stars as Barca hit FC Seoul for seven in pre-season rout
arts.sum: Barcelona continue their preparations for the 2025-26 campaign with a 7-3 victory over South Korean outfit FC Seoul on Thursday.

arts.ttl: Calls mount for Barcelona star to stay after performance vs FC Seoul
arts.sum: Calls have on Thursday mounted amongst the Barcelona fanbase for a member of the club’s defensive ranks to stay put through the summer and beyond. The player in question? Andreas…

arts.ttl: FC Seoul 3-7 Barcelona: Player Ratings From Barca's Preseason Goal Fest
arts.sum: Olmo teed up Lamine Yamal who fired a shot that hit the post, but the rebound fell perfectly into Robert Lewandowski’s path and the veteran striker simply tapped in Barcelona’s opener. La Masia youngster Jofre Torrents played a superb cross into Torres’s path and the super-sub calmly got a way from his man and buried Barcelona’s fifth into the near post.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star tested in new position during FC Seoul clash
arts.sum: A member of the defensive ranks at La Liga champions Barcelona was this evening tested in a new role. The player in question? Gerard Martín. Barcelona are of course currently…

arts.ttl: Barcelona fans take aim at two players during FC Seoul clash
arts.sum: Supporters of La Liga giants Barcelona have on Thursday made known their frustrations with two members of Hansi Flick’s squad. This of course comes with the Blaugrana locked in action,…

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick shows backing for transfer-linked Barcelona star with gesture vs FC Seoul
arts.sum: Barcelona head coach Hansi Flick has on Thursday thrown his backing behind a transfer-linked member of the club’s defensive ranks. The player in question? Ronald Araújo. Stopper Araújo is of…

arts.ttl: Will Rashford start? Predicted Barcelona XI vs. FC Seoul
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at how Barcelona could line up in their pre-season friendly against FC Seoul on Thursday, including a focus on whether Marcus Rashford starts or settles for a place on the bench.
